alert.note: Alert for Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Powder River; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 6:02PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Big Horn, northwestern Powder River and southern Rosebud Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 602 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles west of Colstrip to Busby to 6 miles southeast of Lodge Grass. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Colstrip, Lame Deer, Ashland, Busby, Birney, Brandenberg, Kirby, Muddy Cluster, Rosebud Battlefield Park, Birney Village and Northern Cheyenne Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Powder River; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud
